text: hiṁsā kirīmaṭat, dēva pratikṣēpayaṭat, dēva viśvāsavantayin atara bedum æti kirīmaṭat, mīṭa pera allāh hā ohugē dūtayā saman̆ga saṭan karannanṭa abhaya sthānayak lesaṭat, dēvasthāna (idi kara) gat ovuhu "api yahapata misa venekak apēkṣā nokaḷemu" yæyi divurā pavasati. tavada niyata vaśayenma ovuhu musāvādīhu bava allāh sākṣi darayi
